loginOptionScreen.termsAndCondition: By singing up, you agree to our Terms. See how we use use your data in our Privacy Policy. We never post on Facebook.

mobileNumberScreen.protectCommunity: We protect our community by making sure everyone on Happy is real.
mobileNumberScreen.weNeverShareWithAnyone: We never share this with anyone and it won't be on your profile

otpScreen.enterCodeSent: Enter the code we've sent by text to {{number}}.

privacyPolicyScreen.infoFromDevice: Along with our partners we store and process info from your device to provide feature in the app and improve marketing campaigns.
privacyPolicyScreen.changePrivacySetting: You can always make changes or opt out in your privacy settings. Find out more in our privacy policy

userInfoWalkthrough.wontAbleToChangeLater: You won't be able to change this later.
